examples.example: 在这个欢乐的节日里，大家都沉浸在幸福和喜悦之中。

translate.english: In this joyous festival, everyone is immersed in happiness and joy.

examples.example: 每到节日，我们一家人都会团聚在一起，享受温馨的时光。

translate.english: Every festival, our whole family will get together and enjoy the warm time.

examples.example: 节日里的大街小巷都充满着热闹欢快的氛围。

translate.english: The streets and alleys during the festivals are all filled with a lively and cheerful atmosphere.
